  "plan": {
    "required_context": [
      "demo_qa"
    ],
    "context_plan": [
      {
        "provider": "demo_qa",
        "mode": "slice",
        "selectors": {
          "op": "query",
          "root_entity": "products",
          "select": [
            {
              "expr": "products.product_id",
              "alias": "product_id"
            }
          ],
          "aggregations": [
            {
              "field": "order_items.quantity",
              "agg": "sum",
              "alias": "total_quantity"
            }
          ],
          "group_by": [
            {
              "field": "products.product_id",
              "alias": "product_id"
            }
          ],
          "relations": [
            "items_to_products"
          ],
          "limit": 1,
          "order_by": {
            "field": "total_quantity",
            "desc": true
          }

        "max_tokens": 100
